Module exmpp

The module exmpp provides callbacks for application(3) as well as some generic utilities for other modules of this application.

Behaviours: application.

Authors: Jean-SÃ©bastien PÃ©dron (js.pedron@meetic-corp.com).

Description

The module exmpp provides callbacks for application(3) as well as some generic utilities for other modules of this application.

It's not intended to be used directly.

Function Index

start/0Start applications which exmpp depends on then start exmpp.
version/0Return the version of the application.
